description: When you save an SP file, an .SY file is also saved alongside. You can use either the SP or SY file to reopen content in Simplexety.

common_filenames.description: WIN51IP.SP - Update file included in Windows XP Professional Edition Service Pack 1.
WIN51IC.SP - Update file included in Windows XP Home Edition Service Pack 1.
